base_description: Gray, angular object with a tilted top.
part_description: Consists of a main rectangular body and a slanted top section. The top section is smaller, attached at an angle to the body. There are small, intricate details on the top surface.
internal_interaction_description: The slanted top section is securely attached to the main body, providing structural support. The intricate details on the top surface may serve functional or decorative purposes, potentially interacting with other parts to enhance stability or design.
external_interaction_description: The object is likely designed to interact with other objects or users, possibly as a container or a part of a larger assembly. Its angular design may facilitate specific alignments or connections with external components.
